lead_paragraph: The first-year assistant Kevin Ollie, who played for Jim Calhoun from 1991-95, has been a quiet voice of reassurance for a young Huskies team.
snippet: The first-year assistant Kevin Ollie, who played for Jim Calhoun from 1991-95, has been a quiet voice of reassurance for a young Huskies team.
